name.name: Laplace Beltrami Filter on QuadEdge Meshes

software.description:
The purpose of this filter is to use the Laplace-Beltrami operator to determine surface harmonics in terms
of PointData at each vertex. In the same way that a sound signal can be approximately characterized by a
combination of its most significant frequency components, so can a surface be expressed as a combination
of its surface harmonics. This filter determines the requested N most significant harmonics.
